00025 #ifndef _PHYSICS_FLATTENCOLLIDER_
00026 #define _PHYSICS_FLATTENCOLLIDER_
00027 
00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 
00030 #include <physics/Collider>
00031 #include <physics/CollidableBody>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace physics {
00035 
00036 
00037 /// Simple Collider that flattens a heirarchy of Collidable/CollidableGroups into a flat
00038 ///  set of CollidableBodys.
00039 /// i.e. listeners will only be called with CollidableBodys, no CollidableGroups will be passed
00040 ///   through - instead all combinations of pairs of CollidableBodys from any group will be
00041 ///   passed. This is useful to pass to a CollisionDetector, which only accepts CollidableBodys.
00042 class FlattenCollider : public Collider
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   FlattenCollider() {}
00046   virtual ~FlattenCollider() {}
00047   
00048   virtual String className() const { return String("FlattenCollider"); }
00049 
00050   virtual void collide(ref<const Collidable> collidable1, ref<const Collidable> collidable2);
00051   virtual void collide(ref<const Collidable> collidable) { Collider::collide(collidable); }
00052   
00053 protected:
00054   void collideGroupWithBody(ref<const CollidableGroup> group, ref<const CollidableBody> collidableBody);
00055 };
00056 
00057 
00058 } // physics
00059 
00060 #endif
Generated on Fri Aug 15 15:13:53 2003 for OpenSim by 1.2.18
